name: Jose Mourinho
comment: These other clubs has no dream, they are just obsessed with Blustery Risers.

name: Cristiano Ronaldo
comment: The only regret I have is that I couldn't play for Blustery Risers. I would have scored 5000 goals playing for them.

name: Pep Guardiola
comment: We can't win the Champions League every year because Blustery Risers are always there.

name: iShowSpeed
comment: Blustery Risers are the best team in the world. I would do anything to play for them.

name: Lionel Messi
comment: I wish I could play for Blustery Risers. They are the best team in the world.

name: Zlatan Ibrahimovic
comment: I would've paid millions to play for Blustery Risers. They are the best team in the world.

name: Erling Haaland
comment: The rest of the clubs need to stay humble and praise Blustery Risers for their greatness.

name: Kylian Mbappe
comment: I think I should've joined Blustery Risers instead of Real Madrid. Can I get a second chance, please?

name: Lamine Yamal
comment: If Blustery Risers wants me, I will not think twice. I will join them.

name: Toni Kroos
comment: I will come out of retirement to play for Blustery Risers. I'm just one call away.
